Uses of Class
com.ubicua.didas.resources.DidasRoleAdapter

Packages that use DidasRoleAdapter
Package
Description
com.ubicua.didas.resources
Extends JpaRealmProvider class creating default attributes for specific client roles that will be used to configure the DID document generated by the Didas DidasClientDiscoveryProvider well-known discovery service.

  • Uses of DidasRoleAdapter in com.ubicua.didas.resources

    Description
    private DidasRoleAdapter
    DidasJpaRealmProvider.addAttributes(DidasRoleAdapter adapter, org.keycloak.models.ClientModel client, String name)
    Helper that adds default DID attributes (id, service, context) to the role adapter if it matches the configured discovery roles.
